events.name: Paused
events.comment: Checks to see whether or not the game is paused. False (default) = unpaused, True = paused.

events.name: Positioned
events.comment: Number system that checks to see how many pieces have been fitted in the puzzle

events.name: VolumeSlider_Correct
events.comment: Is the volume slider at the correct frequency?

events.name: Timer
events.comment: time elapsed since start of the game

events.functionDescription: Item clicked is added to the Inventory

children.name: Once_In_Inventory
children.comment: Makes sure the item is added only once to the inventory
